word: H3547 - כָּהַן - kâhan - kaw-han' - Deck - அலங்கரி

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஆசாரிய ஊழியம்செய், ஆசாரியனாயிரு, ஆசாரியராய் ஆராதனைசெய்
to act as a priest, to minister in a priest's office (Piel)
1) to minister as a priest, to serve as a priest
2) to be a priest or to become a priest

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root, apparently meaning to mediate in religious services; but used only as denominative from H3548; to officiate as a priest; figuratively to put on regalia: - deck, be (do the office of a, execute the, minister in the) priest (‘s office).
Cognate: H3547, H3548, H3550, H3552, H3553
